alert.note: Alert for Inland Taylor (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 4:46PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Taylor and southwestern Madison Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 446 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 16 miles northwest of Perry, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake Bird, Iddo, Moseley Hall, Ebb, Secotan, Boyd, Hopewell, Eridu, Sirmans and Shady Grove. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
